bike.description: Specialized E5 Premium Aluminum w/ Smartweld technology, hydroformed aluminum tubing, 1-3/8" lower bearing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized Tarmac, FACT carbon full monocoque, carbon steerer/crown for 1-3/8" lower bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 8mm cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
